publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5026 Mr Tom McCabe: The Draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2005 Amendment (No. 3) Order 2006—That the Finance Committee recommends that the Draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2005 Amendment (No. 3) Order 2006 be approved. Supported by: George Lyon*

S2M-5026 Mr Tom McCabe: The Draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2005 Amendment (No. 3) Order 2006—That the Finance Committee recommends that the Draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2005 Amendment (No. 3) Order 2006 be approved. Supported by: George Lyon
S2M-5026 Withdrawn Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
